A Day of Competition, Energy & Team Spirit

The Arden Volley Cup 2025 is an indoor volleyball tournament gathering amateur and semi-professional teams from across the region for a full day of thrilling competition. Hosted in the modern facilities of Marche-en-Famenne, the tournament aims to promote local sport culture, friendly rivalry, and community connection.

Tournament Format

  • Maximum 24 teams

  • Group stage in the morning, knockout rounds in the afternoon

  • Mixed, Men's & Women's teams accepted

  • 6 players on court per team (substitutes allowed)

  • All games played according to official FIVB rules

  • 2 referees per court

  • Player-only zone (snacks, recovery, physio corner)

  • On-site food & drink (available for all)

  • Spectator stands with audio commentary

  • Live match schedule and results via mobile app

  • Free parking

Registration Details

  • Deadline: August 25, 2025

  • Team roster submission required

  • Limited spots available ‚Äî first come, first served
